sourcesContent:
import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const Dashboard = () => { const history = useHistory(); const [stands, setStands] = useState(""); const startStand = () => { history.push("/session"); }; const addSupply = () => { history.push("/add-supply"); }; useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/stands') .then((res) => {setStands(res.data)}) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) }) return (

Dashboard

Per Cup Breakdown

Current Price per Cup: $4

Cost of Lemon per Cup: $1

Cost of Surgar Mix per Cup: $0.25

Cost of Plastic Cup: $.10

Profit per Cup: $2.65

Change Price Change Recipe

Supplies on Hand

Lemons: 4

Lemonade Mix Scoops: 30

Cups: 30

Past Stands

Date Total Sales
3/1/2022 $54
3/2/2022 $37
3/10/2022 $60
{stands.map((stand, idx) => { //console.log(stands); return (

{stand.total_sales} {stand.created_at}

) })}
) } export default Dashboard;
